explains: n. 跳水，跳水运动；（戴呼吸装备的）潜水
v. 跳水；潜水；突然大幅贬值，暴跌（dive 的现在分词）
wordGroup: scuba diving 轻便（潜水器）潜水
springboard diving n. 弹板跳水
sky diving 尽量延缓张伞的跳伞运动

sentences.en: I'd love to go diving in the Aegean.
sentences.cn: 我很想到爱琴海去潜水。

sentences.en: Bezanik is diving to collect marine organisms.
sentences.cn: 贝赞尼克正在潜水采集海洋生物。

sentences.en: The frogmen were encumbered by their diving equipment.
sentences.cn: 沉重的潜水装备使蛙人行动困难。
